name: Nuclear Labs
description:
Programming, Art, & Design - Luke Bradaric & John Lee

Music - Jonathan Adlesh

Menu's - Brandon Lee

Objective:

Keep your reactor cool by kicking frozen enemies into the water!

Don't let enemies reach your reactor, or they will blow up!

Controls:

Left Click - Shoot current weapon

Right Click - Kick

1 - Switch to Frost Thrower

2 - Switch to Sniper

3 - Switch to Arc Gun
